name: You'll Have to Go Through Me!

description.value: You brace yourself as you prepare to defend your allies behind you. You @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.Area Fire]{Area Fire} or @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.Auto-Fire]{Auto-Fire}. Until the start of your next turn or until you use a move action, whichever happens first, you gain the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.Living Shield]{Living Shield} reaction and, if you would be moved by a forced movement effect, you move 10 feet less.

selfEffect.name: Effect: You'll Have to Go Through Me!
selfEffect.uuid: Compendium.sf2e.feat-effects.Item.Effect: You'll Have to Go Through Me!
